message.content:
Explore the codebase at /Users/imorgado/SPLICE copy/plugin and analyze the build output structure.

Thoroughness level: very thorough

1. Check the vite.config.ts for build configuration
2. Look at what files are generated in dist/
3. Understand how the entry points work (index.html, index.ts)
4. Check if there are multiple panels or just one
5. Review how assets (icons, CSS) are handled

Return the build architecture details needed for manifest.json.

{
  "name": "splice-v3",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Adobe Premiere Pro UXP Plugin with selection tools and AI services integration",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "test": "vitest",
    "test:ui": "vitest --ui",
    "test:coverage": "vitest run --coverage",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "test:e2e:ui": "playwright test --ui",
    "test:all": "npm run test && npm run test:e2e",
    "lint": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix",
    "format": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{ts,tsx,css}\"",
    "typecheck": "tsc --noEmit",
    "uxp:watch": "uxp plugin watch dist",
    "uxp:load": "uxp plugin load dist/manifest.json",
    "uxp:reload": "uxp plugin reload",
    "uxp:debug": "uxp plugin debug",
    "uxp:package": "uxp plugin package",
    "prepare": "husky"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "adobe",
    "uxp",
    "premiere-pro",
    "plugin",
    "spectrum",
    "typescript"
  ],
  "author": "",
  "license": "UNLICENSED",
  "dependencies": {
    "@spectrum-web-components/action-button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/button": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/checkbox": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/dialog": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/icons-workflow": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/menu": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/picker": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/progress-circle": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/textfield": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/theme": "^0.42.0",
    "@spectrum-web-components/toast": "^0.42.0",
    "lit": "^3.2.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@adobe/cc-ext-uxp-types": "^7.3.1",
    "@eslint/js": "^9.39.2",
    "@playwright/test": "^1.49.1",
    "@types/node": "^22.10.2",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.18.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.18.0",
    "@vitest/coverage-v8": "^2.1.8",
    "@vitest/ui": "^2.1.8",
    "eslint": "^9.17.0",
    "globals": "^15.14.0",
    "husky": "^9.1.7",
    "lint-staged": "^15.2.11",
    "prettier": "^3.4.2",
    "typescript": "^5.7.2",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.50.0",
    "vite": "^6.0.5",
    "vitest": "^2.1.8"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{ts,tsx}": [
      "eslint --fix",
      "prettier --write"
    ],
    "*.{json,md,css}": [
      "prettier --write"
    ]
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=20.0.0"
  }
}

DIST OUTPUT STRUCTURE **Generated Files (1.9 MB total):** ``` dist/ ├── index.html (395 bytes) - Main CEP entry point ├── index.js (681.7 KB) - Main bundle (minified, all source code) ├── index.js.map (890.5 KB) - Source map for debugging ├── main.css (2.3 KB) - Global styles (bundled from src/styles) ├── manifest.json (664 bytes) - Adobe UXP plugin manifest │ ├── sp-overlay.js (55 KB) - Spectrum Web Component (lazy-loaded) ├── sp-overlay.js.map (191.7 KB) ├── sp-popover.js (25.9 KB) - Spectrum Web Component (lazy-loaded) ├── sp-popover.js.map (28 KB) ├── sp-tray.js (12.2 KB) - Spectrum Web Component (lazy-loaded) ├── sp-tray.js.map (16.8 KB) ├── focus-visible.js (3.5 KB) - Focus visible polyfill ├── focus-visible.js.map (15.1 KB) └── first-focusable-in.js (287 bytes) - Focus utility └── first-focusable-in.js.map (1.1 KB) ``` **Key Points:** - Spectrum Web Components are code-split into separate chunks (dynamic imports) - All TypeScript is bundled into a single `index.js` - CSS extracted into separate `main.css` file - Source maps included for development debugging --- ### 3.
